name: Touhou DreamWalker
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD / Dpad - walk
  • Z / K /  Gamepad A - Jump
  • X / L / Gamepad B - Shoot
  • F4 - Fullscreen

Roles:

  • Sprite art - Doctor Slump https://doctorslump.itch.io/
  • Music - Eulogous https://eulogous.itch.io/
  • Everything else - EasternMouse

Original jam version is state game was uploaded before jam deadline

Fixes include - working on all platforms, pathway in case player falls in last level of the game, fix for antagonist sprite (effects added back up, mishap with thumb drive files), correct amount of carrots in the end screen, and wrong music playing when switching levels
